data.enText: an activity involving a special skill at making things with your hands

data.chText: 像编篮子之类的传统工艺
手工艺品交易会 / 制作车间
工艺、设计与技术（英国某些学校中的科目）
data.enText: Craft, Design and Technology (= a subject in some British schools)
all the skills needed for a particular activity

data.chText: 在高级饭店学过烹调技艺的厨师
data.enText: chefs who learned their craft in top hotels
skill in making people believe what you want them to believe

data.chText: 他擅长于通过计谋和外交手腕赢得他用武力无法得到的东西。
data.enText: He knew how to win by craft and diplomacy what he could not gain by force.

data.chText: 班轮驶进港口时，周围的许多小船颠簸起来。
data.enText: Hundreds of small craft bobbed around the liner as it steamed into the harbour.

data.chText: 飞行器；飞机；航天器；宇宙飞船；航天飞机

data.enText: to make sth using special skills, especially with your hands

data.chText: 所有的家具均采用天然材料精心制作而成。
data.enText: All the furniture is crafted from natural materials.

ex.chText: 烹饪是一种有用的技能。
阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。
ex.enText: Reading and writing are two different skills.

ex.chText: 他的聪明和技能使我们心生敬佩。
ex.enText: His cleverness and skill earned our admiration.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指实际工作或操作中运用的技巧和能力，尤指通过实践或专门培训而获得并熟练运用的技能。

ex.enText: She is good at the art of painting.
Making people laugh is an art.

ex.chText: 她的表演展示出不凡的技艺。

synonyms.bx: 指进行艺术创作的技能，也可指某人做某事的能力，多为通过学习、操练等而获得。

ex.chText: 她从一位老匠人那儿学得其手艺。
ex.enText: She learned her craft from an old master.

ex.chText: 他们试图将现代技术用于这项传统工艺。
ex.enText: They are trying to apply modern techniques to this traditional craft.
He understood the craft of making furniture.

ex.chText: 他在向游客展示蛋雕工艺。
ex.enText: He was demonstrating the craft of egg carving for tourists.

synonyms.bx: 指工匠等用手工制作物品的传统技艺、本领。

tr: the skilled practice of a practical occupation
example: he learned his trade as an apprentice

tr: a vehicle designed for navigation in or on water or air or through outer space
shrewdness as demonstrated by being skilled in deception
skill in an occupation or trade
people who perform a particular kind of skilled work
example: he represented the craft of brewers
as they say in the trade

tr: make by hand and with much skill
example: The artisan crafted a complicated tool

value.boxr_value: Craft is both the singular and the plural form for meaning 1. 义项1的单复数同形。

value.def: You can refer to a boat, a spacecraft, or an aircraft as a craft .

example.ex: With great difficulty, the fisherman manoeuvred his small craft close to the reef...
example.tran: 渔夫费了很大的劲才把他的小船划到暗礁旁。

example.ex: The troops are reported to have advanced nearly four miles since they were landed from naval craft on Sunday evening.
example.tran: 据报道，部队自周日晚离开海军军舰登陆后已经挺进了将近4英里。

value.def: A craft is an activity such as weaving, carving, or pottery that involves making things skilfully with your hands.

example.ex: ...the arts and crafts of the North American Indians...
example.tran: 北美印第安人的手工艺

example.ex: All kinds of traditional craft industries are preserved here.
example.tran: 这里保留着各种各样的传统手工业。

value.def: You can use craft to refer to any activity or job that involves doing something skilfully.

example.ex: Maurice Murphy, one of the country's leading classical trumpeters, learnt his craft with the Black Dyke Mills band.
example.tran: 作为该国最著名的古典小号演奏家，莫里斯·墨菲曾师从黑堤磨坊铜管乐团。

value.def: If something is crafted, it is made skilfully.

example.ex: The windows would probably have been crafted in the latter part of the Middle Ages...
example.tran: 这些窗户很可能是中世纪后期精心制作的。

example.ex: Many delegates were willing to craft a compromise...
example.tran: 很多代表都想要制订出一个周密的折中方案。

example.ex: The author extracts the maximum from every carefully-crafted scene in this witty tale.
example.tran: 作者从这个妙趣横生的故事的每一个精心构思的情节中都摘录了尽可能多的内容。
买得起的新颖的手工艺包
